name: @systmms/segnomms
description: Advanced QR code generation plugin for Segno with custom shapes, styling, and interactivity

scripts.build: npm run build:python && npm run build:types
scripts.build:types: echo '# Python bundle - no TypeScript types needed' > dist/README.md
scripts.watch: nodemon --watch segnomms --watch scripts --ext py --exec 'npm run build'
